author: Bellular News
description:
Steam just locked adult games behind credit cards—blocking 32% of UK adults who don't have one. Valve says they're complying with the Online Safety Act, but we tested their system and found massive gaps that could trigger 10% global revenue fines. The rushed implementation reveals just how impossible these laws are.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Valve Had No Choice
01:38 The Law Comes For Valve
02:59 Valve's New Policy
05:19 Does It Work?
07:11 Oh Dear...
10:56 The True Test Begins
